Build chatbots for LINE: 为 LINE 构建聊天室
Push message to the line account: 将消息推送到直线账户
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
The user id can be obtained from the web: 用户ID可以从 webhook payload 获取
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
HEAD: 黑色
\n- Create Line bot account from Develop:
- Create Line bot account from Developer Console
- Go to the "Messaging API" section.
- In the webhook settings, paste this URL: 
  `{{webhookUrl}}`
- Publish Activepieces flow first then click "Verify" button
